籤詩版本二:
Yiya ngqo kwiLiwa elingenakufa ukuze ufunde ukungafi.Xa olu lwazi luthe lwavakaliswa yinkosi,
Isibhakabhaka esiluhlaza, ilanga nenyanga zihlala zikhanya ngokuqaqambileyo, kwaye udumo lwentliziyo elungileyo lunwenwela kulo lonke ihlabathi.
詩意:
Le hexagram luphawu lokufumana isikhokelo kubantu abahloniphekileyo.
Yonke into ihamba kakuhle kunye.
解曰: Kukho isiqalo nesiphelo. Musa ukuya entshonalanga okanye empumalanga. Sebenzisa intliziyo yakho. Kukho abantu abaninzi abahloniphekileyo.
籤詩故事一:
◇ULiu Zhiyuan washiya umkhosi
U-Liu Zhiyuan (uZhiyuan) wayevela eShatao (isizwe sikaShatuo).
ULiu Zhiyuan kunye nenkosikazi yakhe uLi Sanniang babehlala kwamalume wakhe, umalume wakhe wakrokrela ukuba uLiu Zhiyuan (Zhiyuan) uhlwempuzekile, ngoko ke wamcenga uZhiyuan ukuba aye kumyezo wevatala, ngethemba lokuba uLiu uza kutyiwa yimimoya emibini yeemelon. umpu ebusuku, walwa noomoya bevatala, wangena ngaphantsi komhlaba, wemba umhlaba, uthabathe ikrele nencwadi yemfazwe.
Wathatha ikrele lakhe kunye nobuchule bakhe bomkhosi, wathi ndlela-ntle kumfazi wakhe, wangena emkhosini, wabalekela kuYue Xun waza wasebenza njengegosa lommeli wokuxolisa.
I-Khitan yatshabalalisa i-Jin Dynasty, ishiya i-Central Plains ngaphandle kwenkosi. UZhiyuan waba ngumlawuli eJinyang.
Ilizwe latshintshwa laba yiLater Han Dynasty. Isabizwa ngokuba yiTianfu (igama lonyaka) ngaphandle kokutshintsha ixesha.
聖意: Ikhaya likhuselekile, umntu ulungile, imali ilungile, ishishini lilungile, umtshato ulungile, isibini sitshatile, umhambi oyindoda ubuyela entsimini, isiqingatha sombungu siyavunwa, izilwanyana ezintandathu ziphumelele. , umntu ufunyenwe, ityala liphumelele, ukufuduka kulungile, impahla elahlekileyo ilungile, isifo yi-Anshan, ingcwaba lilungile.
